titleStmt.title: SII 4.522: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 522. (A.R. No. 75 of 1892). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE BRIHADISVARA TEMPLE AT GANGAIKONDA-CHOLAPURAM, UDAIYARPALAYAM TALUK, SAME DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . komāṟapaṉmar tirupuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī(H)kulacekaratevaṟku yāṇṭu 4 vatu katkaṭakanāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu caturddaśiyum caṉikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa
Uttirāṭattu nāḷ Uṭaiyār keṅkaikoṇṭacoḷiśvaramuṭaiya nāyaṉārkku tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka nāṭṭuvilaiyaraka vilaikoṇṭa kumāramaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ civatāṇṭāṉ
kāṇiyāṉa vaṭakarai virutarācapayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu vikkiramacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu maṇṇaicoḻavaḷanāṭṭu kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻapurappaṟṟil tevaṇiputtūṟ kellaiyāvatu kiḻpāṟkellai
Uṭaiyār tiruppulīśvaramuṭaiyār tirunāmattukkāṇi kuṟuṅkuṭikkum maṉṉaṉār tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam vīranārāyaṇanallūr tiruvāḻikkallukkum kaṇṇamaṅkalattellaikku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai
kaṇṇamaṅkalam virarācentiracoḻapuram U ṭarom tevanallūr Ellaikku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai maḻavataraiyanallūr kiḻāy meṭṭellaikku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Akkarampaiyāḷa
ṉpaṭṭu Ellaikkut teṟkum Iṉṉāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa Ūrṉattamum maṉaikaḷum nañceyyum puṉceyyum toppukkaḷum Erinirvāṅka nilamum Ūruṇi kuḷamum potuvum potātiyum meṉokkiṉa maramum
kiḻṉokkiṉa kiṇaṟum tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka vilaikoṇṭu Ivvūr nāṉkellaikkum tiruccūlattāpaṉam paṇṇi Ūrile nāṭṭiṉom .
Digital edition of SII 4.522 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
